alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect central Geauga... northeastern Cuyahoga...Lake and Ashtabula Counties Until 500 AM EST.... At 359 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from Euclid to Jefferson, moving south at 10 mph. Travel is nearly impossible along parts of I-90 in Lake and Ashtabula with deep snow covering the interstate. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Snow rates up to 2 inches per hour... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Willoughby, Eastlake, Geneva, Madison, North Kingsville, Perry, Orwell, Burton, and Andover. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 311, 312, 313, 314, 315, 320, 326, 330, 331, and 332.
